headline: Coterra Energy Closes Previously Announced Permian Basin Acquisitions
summary: HOUSTON, January 28, 2025--Coterra Energy Inc. (NYSE: CTRA) ("Coterra" or the "Company") completed its previously announced acquisitions consisting of certain assets of Franklin Mountain Energy and Avant Natural Resources and its affiliates for aggregate consideration of approximately $3.9 billion, subject to certain post-closing purchase price adjustments.
